ModMetaData.name: Sleepy's More Psycasts VPE
ModMetaData.author: Sleepy068
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/IIdHbEw.png[/img] [h2]Sleepy's More Psycasts (v1.0.3)[/h2]
[b]Credit[/b] This mod is a fork of Noodles and DC's amazing [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2460833332]More Psycasts[/url] mod. I absolutely loved their mod, so much so i approached them to fork it when 1.4 released. During this process I became worried that what I envisioned and considered balanced was skewing too far from what they originally designed. In realising this, I supported Noodles in updating the original mod to 1.4 so as to ensure those that enjoyed that mod could continue to do so while I could make my fork exactly how I wanted too.
I love to add content to this game that I feel is missing or that I'd like expanded. I figure that if I enjoy what I've added, others may too so I to post my mods to the workshop. Balance is critical to me as I am a vanilla player and I'll try to ensure nothing is unbalanced but ultimately I have a goal in mind for the content I am adding so what I consider balanced may not always be what you'd consider balanced. Hopefully you enjoy the mod none the less.
This is the Vanilla Psycast Expanded Edition of Sleepy's More Psycasts and will therefore require that to work. I have kept the two versions separate to make things easier with trouble shooting potential issues and keeping the mod's code a bit cleaner and focused.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/DbnM7jC.png[/img] [b]What Does This Mod Add?[/b] 25 new psycasts: [img]https://i.imgur.com/SLmwvWv.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/2rh1iv6.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/o6QJzTR.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/HzzR7xj.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/7HZRDG2.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/3fGzzTE.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/IbY9lVQ.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/6P4uu0d.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Es2S9Jw.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/kycUCKb.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/oy8JKfA.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/4zFQHgs.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/F1v79QI.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/v5KdOJa.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/KmBxQ9N.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/tpIwAWA.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/gow9Ur4.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/FltS3da.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/tt3I7AF.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/wBbkahm.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/hTEeTvq.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/TiKhA6i.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/DarpE8a.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/bIh1sIe.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/22QLKRl.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ss8ZNXk.png[/img] [b]Roadmap:[/b] - Add more relevant and balanced psycasts.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/YySbEPN.png[/img] [b]On Going Games:[/b] - Maintain a VPE compatible mirror of Sleepy's More Psycasts
[b]Compatibility[/b] - Vanilla Psycasts Expanded: Required - Combat Extended: Not Compatible
[b]Integrated Compatibility:[/b] - Vanilla Psycasts Expanded: Required
[img]https://i.imgur.com/gghc3iQ.png[/img] [b]Conflicts[/b] None reported.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/31kQWwH.png[/img] [b]Known Issues[/b] None at the moment.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WokZwPP.png[/img] [b]Language Support[/b] English (Always Latest)(Developed in this Language)
Github: https://github.com/sleepy068/Rimworld_MorePsycasts
Please post any issue reports to my Github. I appreciate any feedback but please keep in mind I have a goal in mind for the content I am adding so what I consider balanced may not always be what you'd consider balanced.
